subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Juan Pablo Montoya has been a winner on nearly every major racing circuit, from the old CART open-wheel series to the Indianapolis 500 to Formula One, the world’s premier auto racing stage.
snippet: Juan Pablo Montoya has been a winner on nearly every major racing circuit, from the old CART open-wheel series to the Indianapolis 500 to Formula One, the world’s premier auto racing stage.
